place.name: BOWER
place.gazetteerText: Bower.-- par. and hamlet with ry. sta. (4 miles distant), NE. Caithness-shire, 11½ miles NW. of Wick, 19,677 ac., pop. 1608; P.O. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
